prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        After mapping ingredients, optionally rewrite the cooking steps to reference the chosen products.

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "10-Min Veggie Egg Fried Rice with HP Drizzle",
  "description": "A quick one-pan fried rice with mixed veg and fluffy eggs, finished with a mild soy seasoning and a touch of HP sauce for a familiar SA twist.",
  "servings": "Single portion",
  "instructions": [
    "Heat 1 teaspoon olive oil in a nonstick pan over medium-high heat.",
    "Add 1 clove minced garlic and 2 chopped spring onion whites; stir-fry for 30 seconds.",
    "Tip in 3/4 cup frozen mixed vegetables; stir-fry 2 minutes until hot.",
    "Add 1 cup cooked cold rice, breaking up clumps; stir-fry 2–3 minutes until steamy.",
    "Push rice to one side; add 2 lightly beaten eggs to the empty side and scramble until just set.",
    "Combine eggs with rice and veg; add 1 tablespoon soy sauce and a pinch of salt and pepper; stir 30–60 seconds to coat.",
    "Remove from heat; top with spring onion greens and drizzle 1 teaspoon HP sauce over the rice.",
    "Taste and adjust salt and pepper; serve immediately."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "1 clove",
      "preparation": "minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "spring onion",
      "quantity": "2",
      "preparation": "whites and greens separated, sliced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "frozen mixed vegetables",
      "quantity": "3/4 cup"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "rice",
      "quantity": "1 cup cooked",
      "preparation": "cold if possible"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "eggs",
      "quantity": "2",
      "preparation": "lightly beaten"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "soy sauce",
      "quantity": "1 tablespoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "HP sauce",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon",
      "preparation": "for drizzling"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt and pepper",
      "quantity": "to taste"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Flexitarian"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "ModernAmerican",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "Egg",
      "Gluten",
      "Soy"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "ValueStaples"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Solo"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Output schema:
        ```json
        {
  "product_matches": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "string",
      "selected_product_id": "string or null",
      "package_quantity": "float or int indicating number of retail packs",
      "package_notes": "brief rationale",
      "ingredient_line": "optional text using product name"
    }
  ],
  "updated_instructions": [
    "optional step list rewritten with product names"
  ]
}
        ```

    "Heat 1 teaspoon Woolworths Cooking Olive Oil (Cooking Olive Oil 1 L) in a nonstick pan over medium-high heat.",
    "Add 1 small spoon of Fresh Crushed Garlic 50 g and the whites from 2 Mild Spring Onions 100 g; stir-fry for 30 seconds.",
    "Tip in about 3/4 cup frozen mixed vegetables (standard stir-fry mix); stir-fry 2 minutes until hot.",
    "Add about 1 cup Asian Inspired Fully Cooked Rice 300 g, breaking up clumps; stir-fry 2–3 minutes until steamy.",
    "Push rice to one side; add 2 eggs from Free Range Large Eggs 6 pk (lightly beaten) to the empty side and scramble until just set.",
    "Combine eggs with rice and veg; add 1 tablespoon Asian Tamari Soy Sauce 200 ml and a pinch of Salt and Pepper in Grinder 60 g; stir 30–60 seconds to coat.",
